title: 2 people killed every day on city's streets (Shanghai Municipal Government)
text: ( Source : Shanghai Municipal Government ) Two people are killed every day on the roads of Shanghai , according to official figures released yesterday. In the first 295 days of the year, 619 people lost their lives after being involved in a
